titles.title: Behold a spotless Victim dies My surety

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Behold! A spotless Victim dies, My surety on the tree; The Lamb of God, the Sacrifice, He gave Himself for me!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Whatever curse was mine, He bore; The wormwood and the gall, There, in that lone mysterious hour, My cup—He drained it all!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Lord Jesus! Thou, and none beside, Its bitterness could know, Nor other tell Thy joy’s full tide That from that cup shall flow.

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: And while the ages roll along, This shall my glory be; And this the new and endless song, Thy love to us—to me!
